use a form of the hydrostatic equation that depends on air density

values.1: process the Water Ice Friendly Aerosol input from metgrid

values.1: assumes a known first several layers, then generates equi-height spaced levels up to the model top

values.12: uses SINT, and same scheme for computation of fine-grid lateral boundaries
